author: andreas
msg: Moved method isValidDocumentName() from DocumentManager to DocumentBuilder. Allow dashes in document name in DefaultDocumentBuilder. This fixes bug #38127. Thanks for the patch by Renaud Richardet.

author: azeez
msg: Changed buildir property to project.build.dir since buildir may conflict with the maven buildir property

author: ajith
msg: Updated the maven.xml for webapps with the correct policy version. this error caused the war build to fail
